void add_function ( $handler, [$token_type = TOKEN_DEFAULT] )

Register event handler.

- string $handler: Name of event handler.
- integer $token_type: Token type to use for links to the function.

call_single

void &call_single ( &$e )

Call single event. 
Even if a next event is defined by use of event::set_caller() this
 function will ignore it. Use call() instead.
Function Parameters:
- object $e: event Event to trigger.
Function Info:
Access - public
